verbs.description: < p > First lady Melania Trump [V: is] " doing great , " according to President Trump on Friday.</p >
< p > [ARG0: First lady Melania Trump] is " [V: doing] [ARGM-MNR: great] , " according to President Trump on Friday.</p >
< p > First lady Melania Trump is " doing great , " [V: according] to President Trump on Friday.</p >
